name: Floowandereeze and the Magnificent Map
text: During your Main Phase: You can reveal 1 Level 1 "Floowandereeze" monster in your hand and banish 1 "Floowandereeze" card with a different name from your Deck, then, immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon the revealed monster. If your opponent Normal Summons a monster: Immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 "Floowandereeze" monster. You can only use each effect of "Floowandereeze and the Magnificent Map" once per turn.
